languages.text: "Поиск древних кораблей и реликвий — дело интересное. Я помогу тебе, конечно".
"Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."
languages.original_text: "Поиск древних кораблей и реликвий — дело интересное. Я помогу тебе, конечно".

traits.locale_text: "Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting endeavor. Of course I'll help you."
"Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting endeavor. Of course I'll help you."
"Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."
"Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."
"Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."

languages.text: “寻找远古舰船与圣物是件令人兴奋的事情，我会帮你的。”
languages.original_text: "Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."

traits.locale_text: “寻找远古舰船与圣物是件令人兴奋的事情，我会帮你的。”

languages.text: «Buscar naves y reliquias antiguas es muy emocionante. Claro que puede contar conmigo».
languages.original_text: "Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."

traits.locale_text: «Buscar naves y reliquias antiguas es muy emocionante. Claro que puede contar conmigo».

languages.text: 「古代の船や遺物を探すのは面白いことだ。もちろん協力しよう」
languages.original_text: "Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."

traits.locale_text: 「古代の船や遺物を探すのは面白いことだ。もちろん協力しよう」

languages.text: "Die Suche nach alten Schiffen und Relikten ist eine spannende Sache. Natürlich helfe ich Euch."
languages.original_text: "Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."

traits.locale_text: "Die Suche nach alten Schiffen und Relikten ist eine spannende Sache. Natürlich helfe ich Euch."

languages.text: « Partir en quête d'un vaisseau ancien et d'une relique, voilà le genre d'aventure qui me plaît. Vous pouvez compter sur mon aide. »
languages.original_text: "Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."

traits.locale_text: « Partir en quête d'un vaisseau ancien et d'une relique, voilà le genre d'aventure qui me plaît. Vous pouvez compter sur mon aide. »

languages.text: "Antik gemileri ve yadigârları aramak, heyecanlı bir macera demek. Tabii ki yardımımı esirgemeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Searching for ancient ships and relics is an exciting prospect. Of course I'll help you."

traits.locale_text: "Antik gemileri ve yadigârları aramak, heyecanlı bir macera demek. Tabii ki yardımımı esirgemeyeceğim."
